simplenlg.kb
Class JavaKB

java.lang.Object
  simplenlg.kb.JavaKB
All Implemented Interfaces:
NLGKB
public class JavaKB
extends Object
implements NLGKB

JavaKB implements a simpleNLG KB by using Java classes.

That is, a KB class is just a Java class, and a KBEntity is just a Java instance of a class. Features are just fields, and the value of a feature named X is the value of the field named X.

All classes referenced in a Java KB must be in a package (which does not have subpackages). The name of the package is an argument to the constructor.

All classes references in a Java KB should also extend (be subclasses of) JavaKBClass. This implements the KBEntity interface for instances of a class

Author:
ereiter

getClass

public KBEntity getClass(String className)
Description copied from interface: NLGKB
finds the class with the specified name.

depending on the KB, can return an instance of the class or a representation of the class itself. returns null if no class with this name exists.

Specified by:
